name: Assault League
description:
Take on an unrelenting enemy force in this new top-down shooter coming soon to Windows and hopefully other platforms in the near future!Infiltrate the enemy compound, sneak into their bunker and blow it to pieces - simple, right?Every bunker is different to the last, with different enemies, traps, tech and weaknesses.

Guns! Shotguns, rifles, machine guns and even some special experimental weapons.

Bosses! Aerial assault vehicles, mechs, drilling machines, power armour!

Puzzles! Those baddies really don't want you to get their hands on their spoils.

Traps! Lasers, landmines and sentry guns!

Blasts! Destroy the enemy bunker by bringing down structural weaknesses or blowing up a reactor core.

Escape! But you gotta go fast to get out of there before the place goes boom.

THIS GAME IS IN EARLY ACCESS AND IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT - ALL FUTURE UPDATES ARE INCLUDED :)
